channel.title: Listen Up on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Listen Up on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: These Hi-Fi Speakers Are Made out of Rocket Fuel Tanks
item.description: The &Space Project upcycles waste materials from space development. Now it has designed Debris, a set of speakers using test fuel tanks from commercial rockets.
